content.question: The excerpt most directly reflects which of the following trends of the 1980s?

choices.label: The continued growth of the influence of liberal political ideas
The religious diversity of the Republican Party’s supporters
The increasing public belief in the federal government’s positive influence on society
The expanding political participation of Christian groups

content.answer: The expanding political participation of Christian groups

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
